mapper.select:
select r.rcp_no, r.rcp_name, r.rcp_ingr, r.rcp_time, r.rcp_desc, r.rcp_detail from recipe r where r.rcp_no = #{rcp_no}
and r.rcp_no like concat('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
and r.rcp_name like concat('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
order by r.rcp_no asc limit #{limitNum}, 10
mapper.insert: insert into recipe (rcp_no, rcp_name, rcp_time, rcp_ingr, rcp_desc, rcp_detail) values( #{rcp_no}, #{rcp_name}, #{rcp_time}, #{rcp_ingr}, #{rcp_desc}, #{rcp_detail});
